Hi! I’m Marius, co-founder of <url1>QED</url1>, a blockchain company from Timisoara, Romania, acquired by <url2>Sandbox</url2> in 2024.
Beyond tech, I’m the President of <url3>Viitorul Boxing Club</url3> and a soon-to-be certified coach, promoting health and well-being in my community.
